conversation.event: <0>speech</0> <1>Ah, it's nice to see someone else with rank.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>You know, with a vest like mine our yours.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>Of course, I'm an overseer and you're an athlete, but still.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>There are so many lower class citizens in these areas.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
